name: img tag with empty/no alt tag
description: Finds all tags that don't have an 'alt' attribute, as well as all tags with a blank 'alt' attribute. Useful for SEO.
content: Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com! Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with ctrl-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial. author: Tay
